description.excerpt:
DAME contains a registry of model containers and input data files, as well as metadata about what input data needs to be loaded to run regional configurations and setups of any given model. 
Given a model identifier (e.g., TopoFlow for the Awash region: `topoflow36_2.1.0_Awash`), DAME downloads the model container and its execution environment, and fetches the datasets needed (e.g., soil data, elevation data, etc). Then users can run the model with different input scenarios.
Desktop Application for Model Execution (DAME) is a command line interface for executing environmental models

installation.excerpt:
To install the latest version of DAME, open a terminal and run:

```bash
pip install dame-cli
```
DAME works in Linux, MacOS and Windows.  It is installed through a simple pip command.

documentation.excerpt: Full documentation of the CLI, including usage examples, can be found at: https://dame-cli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

requirement.excerpt:
1. Docker
2. Python >= 3.6


### Docker 

DAME can use Docker to manage and run containers of software components. 

- [Installation on Linux](https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/)
- [Installation on MacOS](https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/install/)
- [Installation on Windows](https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-windows/install/)

DAME uses Python. To install Python, just follow the steps below:

- [Installation on Linux](https://realpython.com/installing-python/#linux)
- [Installation on MacOS](https://realpython.com/installing-python/#macos-mac-os-x)
- [Installation on Windows](https://realpython.com/installing-python/#windows)

**Merged pull requests:**

- Release v1.5.0 [\#67](https://github.com/mintproject/dame_cli/pull/67) ([sirspock](https://github.com/sirspock))

excerpt.name: Release 5.0.0
excerpt.body:
Features

* Run models using local data
* Configure with custom ModelCatalog or user
* Support Docker on Windows, Linux and macOS (Beta)
* Validation of URLs
* List and show model configurations and setups

Commits

* Merge branch 'master' of github.com:mintproject/dame_cli (a04918a)
* review documentation (8d165dd)
* feat: add travis python 3.8 (88dd4ab)
* feat: fix coverage (#57) (fd306bf)
* Add coverage badge (ba8c6ad)
* fix: get_file test (e42a040)
* Merge branch 'master' of github.com:mintproject/dame_cli (6cce109)
* fix: show progress bar when download image (59b76bd)
* Fix: download zip on windows (#56) (6ee5d16)
* fix: uri cannot be empty (4ec4dba)
* Merge branch 'master' of github.com:mintproject/dame_cli (10ef509)
* Local data (#55) (c6b728e)
* add: documentation about profile and show/list (ee47bec)
* add: documentation about local_data (f27fdf3)
* Update gitignore for virtual environments (6757fb0)
* Adding support Docker (#54) (d16aa5b)
* Add header Documentation (e4e009f)
* Fix: typo Requirements (03c4620)
* fix: accept urls with space at beginning (73493ec)
* fix: handle resource without label (ae2a36a)
* fix: wrong import path (e5a9c3f)
* typo (6dc713b)
* Update index.md (c6b88e7)
* feat: profile - allow to change the user and server (#48) (f475b8a)
* fix: validate prompt as a url (#49) (7570cd3)
*  show information about modelconfiguration and setups (#47) (fe2ff0d)
* Merge branch 'master' of github.com:mintproject/dame_cli (8a9332d)
* fix: change version __init__.py (72420d9)
* Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/mintproject/dame_cli (e3e1c32)
* updates to documenation (28bd3c3)
